item.title: Scalable Real-Time Credit Card Fraud Detection System

item.description: This repository contains a complete end-to-end system for real-time credit card fraud detection, including data analysis notebooks, a machine learning API, and infrastructure-as-code for cloud deployment. item.title: TechBurst – Revolutionary AI Solution for Identifying Counterfeit Products
item.author: xuanphuc.a1gv@gmail.com (Felix Hoang)
item.description: This project aims to provide users with a reliable solution to identify counterfeit products. Originally designed as a C2C Ecommerce Platform, the project has evolved to focus solely on counterfeit detection. The system offers two methods for users to verify product authenticity: utilizing a Teachable Machine model and employing a barcode scanner.
